descriptionHTML:
Mountains watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Mountains Watch Face for business. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches.

Mountains Watch Face features:
✔ Support both round and square displays
✔ Watchface for Android Wear watches
✔ Battery level
✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
✔ Display seconds

How to use Mountains Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Mountains watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Mountains Watch Face for Android Wear!

comments: Like, but... The ambient mode needs to be darker than this. Need to keep these batteries lasting longer. Otherwise it's pretty cool.
Pretty cool app using on Fossil Q Marshal very nice faces and one of the coolest watch face app on play store a must download for Android Wear Users
